page.title: 02Shiphay
page.content: My name is Andrei. I am eight years old. I live in Shiphay, which is a suburb of Torquay. I have a brother called Christopher who is five years old. Shiphay has the main hospital of Torbay as well as very old places like Water Lane and Edginswell. There are a lot of brand new houses in Veille Park, one of the estates. I live in one of the semi-detached houses. Lots of people are moving to this area and there are not enough services. There are more children so there have to be more, or larger, schools. Both my mum and dad work in the hospital. My mum helps to clean the floors and my dad takes X-rays.
